message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $12,000. It's a great deal for both of us, as it's worth $10,000 to you and I'm confident you'll get good value out of it. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to stay within my budget. Can you meet me at $9,000?

Bob, I appreciate your interest and understand your budget.  While $9,000 is a bit lower than I'd hoped for, I'm willing to come down to $11,000.  This price still reflects the value of the product and allows for a fair deal for both of us.  Let me know if this works for you.
I appreciate your willingness to come down, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $9,000 and $11,000. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $10,250?
